title: DVD Photo Slideshow Pro 7.97-serial incl
description:
DVD Photo Slideshow Version 7.97 allows you to create entertaining photo slideshows you can watch on TV, generate MPEG video files for mobile devices such as Apple iPod, Sony PSP, cellular phone, build photo slideshow video ready for upload to YouTube, MySpace. 


what is new :    * Make Flash Slideshow for Web.
                * Play flash video for Web.
                 * New! DV & video clips to DVD Video Disc Burning Solution.
  
DVD Photo Slideshow

 Create DVD Photo slideshow from digital photo album, make MPEG photo slideshow for mobile solution.

Just select your photos and drop them in the slideshow, add a custom soundtrack, pick from over 360 stunning transition effects, choose from Hollywood style DVD menu templates, burn onto DVD disc or create MPEG video files for any mobile devices or posting online. It can also generate web photo album for your own photo website. more about DVD burning software... Flash Tour for DVD Photo Slideshow...

DVD Photo Slideshow gives you more output options than any other slide show software. It supports DVD, SVCD, VCD 2.0, MPEG, MPEG-4, FLV (Flash for Video), HTML slideshow as output formats. Create photo video CD or DVD that play back on your TV with DVD player. Generate MPEG MPEG photo slideshow for PC viewing. Generate MPEG-4 encoded photo slide show for mobile devices such as iPod, Zune, PSP, mobile phone and PDA. Create Flash slideshow or MP4 slide show, perfect for e-mailing or posting online to your website; Make web photo slideshow. DVD Photo Slideshow does it all in a Simple and Professional way!
Key Features

    * New! Add Video Clips to photo slideshow and burn video to DVD!
    * Make Web Photo Album to show photo slideshow on website.
    * Supports more slideshow output options: MPEG video, FLV, MPEGII, MPEG-4, 3GP video
    * Support trimming background music and recording your own voice.
    * High quality VCD, SVCD, DVD output : photo or picture looks great on TV.
    * Support designing your own Hollywood-style video and motion menus.
    * Decorate your photos with your own voice, text, art clips.
    * Customize transition effects, Pan & Zoom for individual slide.
    * Support amazing SWF Flash album themes, titles and credits for slideshow.
    * All-in-One: Basic picture editing, Creating slide show with music, Burning DVD disc.
    * Supports both PAL and NTSC formats. Fullscreen (4:3) and Widescreen (16:9) output.



 Turn your digital photos into exciting DVD movies and create slideshows on iPod, Zune, PSP and 3GP Cell Phones, with music and elegant effects. That's so easy with DVD Photo Slideshow!

DVD Photo Slideshow strengthens all its original merits such as multiple transition effects, background music, adjustable slide duration and editable text showed on pictures. Just add your photos to your slide show, and enhance it with text captions, transitions, ken burns effects, music and pre-designed DVD menu styles, etc.
Create a multimedia slideshow with style

Breathe life into your digital photos by adding stunning special transitions, soundtracks, ken burns-styled motion effects and DVD menu with drag-and-drop ease. Additional DVD styles are provided for free and added regularly.
Share your stories in creative, entertaining ways

Burn your slideshow onto a video disc (DVD, VCD or SVCD) for play back on TV. You can also generate standalone video files of your slideshow in AVI, MPEG, WMV, MPEG4 format, share the memories on iPod, Zune, 3GP mobile-based portable device.
Create and burn your photo slide show DVD or CD with clicks

DVD Photo Slideshow enables you conveniently create your own digital photo album. After the preview of your slide show created, you can easily burn them onto a blank DVD or CD disc that can be enjoyed both on your PC and TV with a DVD or VCD player. Within a few minutes of work, you'll have an eye-catching slide show with DVD, SVCD, VCD, MPEG, MPEG-4, FLV (Flash for Video) as output formats. Note: If you need to add purchased DRM protected music to slideshow, please use TuneClone to convert M4P to MP3.

Save and organize your Photo, Picture and Image

With this digital photo album program, you can easily archive hundreds of your favorite high-resolution photo into a DVD or CD disc that is accessible by your PC. You can share your archived DVD or CD discs with friends, family, clients or colleagues!
